Couldn't attend the Selenium Conference 2015 held last week in Portland, Oregon? Neither could I!

Luckily, the Selenium Conference has posted videos of the event at http://confengine.com/selenium-conf-2015/schedule.





Check them out there on on the Selenium Conference YouTube channel at https://www.youtube.com/user/seleniumconf. I can't wait to review them and see what I missed!






-T.J. Maher
